review_text: This place was a treasure! It was perfect for us, perfect location, perfect flexible space. Also, we were fortunate to be there when the lilacs were blooming and that lovely fragrance wafted in when we opened the windows on a delicious breeze.
Quiet relaxing spot very close to traverse city with a cute wooded back yard! The host was very responsive and helpful throughout our stay.
The apartment was great! Very nice and clean. Diane was very responsive when I had any questions. Would definitely recommend and would stay again.

Gary was amazing. We made our reservation day of and Gary immediately offered us an early check in. The house is a lovely little place. It is perfect for a cozy weekend getaway. The lofting is a fun addition. Everything you could want is within walking distance and Gary was more than helpful in picking the best places to go. The area felt residential and safe with the beach, fun breweries and coffee shops within walking distance. 100% would visit again, a must book in traverse city.
Fantastic space, location, and host! Will absolutely use again!

Loved my stay here! Everything was just as described. Can't beat the location, walking distance to everything. Gary was an amazing host. He provided recommendations of things for us to do as it was our first time in Traverse City. He even offered one of his bikes so my brother could use. I would definitely stay here again!

Gary is a fabulous host. He greeted me and did a walk through of his airbnb. The location is what drew me to this Airbnb. Walking a few blocks and you’re in downtown TC. Quaint and beautiful neighborhood. Pay attention to the loft and ladder set up. I wasn’t comfortable with it. I was very careful going up and coming down. It was a warm first evening and Gary walked me through cooling the loft down via the window unit air conditioning and ceiling fan. That helped! (The windows don’t even have an option to open!) Last but not least: I wish we had an extra refrigerator around here and the hosts def utilize the freezer in the unit. In my 100 plus stays that might have been a first.. like staying with family but paying for it :)

Gary’s place was wonderful! Beautiful and quiet setting, but within walking distance to downtown coffee, libations, and eateries. Gary himself was a wonderful - even providing a few homemade muffins. Highly recommend!

We throughly enjoyed our stay at Gary’s for a wedding weekend getaway. Our host went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The cottage was very charming and we enjoyed all the unique artwork and decor. Some of the highlights included the large bathroom countertops ideal for getting ready for the wedding, the walkability to bustling charming downtown, the comfortable bed, and the delicious homemade muffins our host kindly left for us. We highly recommend staying with Gary in beautiful Traverse City!
Gary was a great host, very responsive and friendly, made us feel right at home.

My husband and I thoroughly our stay at Gary (and Lisa's) guesthouse. It was very comfortable, private, and a great location. Everything you need is provided. It's very close to the TART hike/bike trail, which we enjoyed. It was also very close, and easy to walk, into town where all the shops and restaurants are located. Gary and Lisa were so hospitable. They took the time to welcome us and give us some great recommendations on places to eat and visit. Without hesitation, we would stay there again when visiting Traverse City!

This place was perfect for our weekend in Traverse City! The location could not have been better. Walking distance to everything and the parking spot was so convenient. The place itself was clean and comfortable, we felt right at home.
Gary is an excellent host! He was so accommodating and kind, with helpful tips as we were planning our biking route. We will definitely be back!

Fantastic host in a fantastic space. The area looks exactly like the pictures and is super cozy. Gary is amazing as a host - he was wonderful to talk to and gave us great advice on how to spend our time in Traverse City. The studio is also just a few blocks from downtown Traverse City and is well positioned for either walking or driving.
Gary was a great host! Friendly and flexible. The location was perfect and allowed us to easily access downtown Traverse City.
Gary’s place was awesome and Gary and Lisa were great hosts. Highly recommended.
My wife and I had a spectacular Labor Day weekend in TC. Our host Gary gave us some great recommendations for touring the Leelanlau Peninsula. He was a wonderful host.

This is my second stay with Gary and Lisa and I’d recommend. You can’t beat the location. So many things are within walking distance. The area is quiet and the garden is top notch. Gary and Lisa are knowledgeable about the area and have great suggestions if you need them. I plan to go back and look forward to more MI adventures.
Excellent all around: location, communication, the space itself, just everything. 10/10 would recommend!
Gary was a fantastic host with an amazing spot 5 minutes from downtown. We were able to walk everywhere! Gary even gave some great recommendations that ended up being our favorites parts of the trip.

My wife and I had a great time staying at Gary’s place! The place was stocked with everything you might need. The location could not have been more perfect, as we were able to walk everywhere we wanted to go, literally minutes from the heart of downtown TC and Front St. There’s even a free off-street parking space in case you need to drive somewhere. Highly recommend staying here if visiting TC!
Making this place a yearly trip! thanks Gary!
Nice, clean and comfortable accommodation located a short walk from Downtown TC! Was perfect for our stay and we can’t wait to come back!
Cute little stay! Gary is very friendly and apartment is super cute and cozy! Short walk to down town area! Very clean and comfy!
Description is very accurate! Great surrounding area, VERY close to downtown, cozy airbnb for a long weekend! Highly recommend!
Great location!
Great location great host would stay again

Gary was an incredibly gracious and hospitable host. From allowing a late check-out to accommodate our travel, to offering umbrellas on a rainy day when we were traveling around town on foot, Gary made sure our stay was great. The space is cozy and offers everything you will need for a weekend in Traverse City. The location is impeccable and offers great access to all the amenities of downtown. We will absolutely keep Gary in mind for our future visits to the area.
Perfect location for walkable access to downtown TC! A cute little boho gem that suits an active traveller's stay!
Very easy to work with and a fantastic location!

The place was perfect for my girlfriend and I to spend a couple days in Traverse City. Clean and just as described. Easy parking and a quick walk to downtown and to a stop for the Bayline bus line which we took to The Village at Grand Traverse Commons. Gary and Lisa were lovely and gave helpful suggestions for the area.
Thanks again, Gary!!
Gary was very kind and generous! The space was cute, cozy and welcoming. It really is a very short walk to downtown. We had an amazing stay, well worth the money!
This is a super cute little place with an easy walk to lots of great bars and restaurants downtown. Gary was an excellent host and we’d be happy to stay here again!

Awesome location and perfect, quaint studio for a Traverse City getaway. It was clean and quirky, and truly only a short 5-minute-or-less walk to downtown. Excellent shower/water pressure, full sized refrigerator and freezer, stocked with towels and other travel necessities. Gary was very accommodating and friendly.
Charming space- extremely well located to walk to local shops! Gary is a very thoughtful host and we really enjoyed our stay in his wonderful home!
Gary and Lisa were great hosts. They were very accommodating and there house is in the perfect location! Everything was private and we felt comfortable the whole time, great stay!
Can’t beat the location. Cozy, clean, easy check-in - can’t say enough good things. Gary and Lisa are great hosts!
We had great accommodations and the owner was very nice! The location is a great walking distance to downtown. We enjoyed the stay very much and the description/pictures of the place are spot on.

We stayed at Gary's for the second time this summer- this time during the Traverse City Ironman. The location is unbeatable and the accommodations were perfect for our needs. Gary is incredibly welcoming and great to communicate with. We will be back again!
So helpful and considerate! It’s great to be so close to town!

This was a lovely spot for our stay in Traverse. Close to everything, and a great patio to hang out on in the summer evenings. The little kitchen area with a fridge, sink, and glassware was a nice touch. The space is a bit older, so everything feels a bit close together, but the pictures in the listing are accurate.

Great place and great host! My wife and I loved the decor as well as their beautiful landscaping. Very easy access to downtown— we really liked the Coin Slot, just a couple blocks up the road. True hospitality and the best Airbnb experience we’ve had.

Amazing hosts! Gary and Lisa were very friendly and offered many suggestions to us. Place was very comfortable. Very close to many shops and restaurants. Gary was easy to talk to and available if we had any questions.
Great garden to sit in & enjoy. Left the door open for late arrival so no fumbling around in the dark. Provided milk, sugar, breakfast cereal, etc. Nice.

Gary and Lisa were great hosts! We felt very comfortable during our stay. When we arrived, they offered many recommendations of things to do during our 3 days there. The location is perfect and only about a 5 minute walk to downtown. Highly recommend!
Cool, unique space. Walking distance to everything traverse city has to offer. Host was very accomodating and friendly - even had wine ready for us upon arrival. Easy check in/out

Great aesthetic! GREAT HOSTS! Great & safe location! Great overall space! Private parking spot in alley. Nice outdoor area w/ fire pit. Full control of AC. There is a full size fridge & a double kitchen sink, coffee pot and plenty of dishes, but no microwave or oven. Bathroom has shampoo/conditioner, body wash/soap, towels, etc, which proved to be extremely helpful. Overall, the best Airbnb I’ve stayed in yet!
Had a great stay here. Gary was very accommodating and answered any questions we had promptly. Even left a thermos of coffee in the morning during a power outage. Very thoughtful.

Staying here definitely enriched our stay in Traverse City! It's only a few minutes to walk to wonderful restaurants, cafes, shops, entertainment, and the water. Gary and Lisa were great hosts and seem like really lovely people. Their place tells a story and I enjoyed all the unique decor. It was a peaceful, clean, and comfortable studio that made us feel right at home. Gary was very informative and texted me photos and instructions. We met him upon arrival and he shared some tips on what to do nearby. They provided wine, beer, coffee, milk, and cereal for us. We absolutely loved The Little Fleet and lucked out being in the City in the midst of pride celebrations. We look forward to staying with them again as there's lots more I'd love to explore in town.

We had a fabulous two night stay! The location was fantastic- close to restaurants and the water. The accommodations were just what we needed. Gary was a wonderful host- incredibly welcoming and quick to respond. We’ll definitely be back!

Excellent place to stay for a long weekend! Very easy to walk downtown - close to good food, coffee, brewpubs, parks and more. The place was comfortable and clean, and communication with Gary was easy. Highly recommended.

The place was perfect. Within walking distance to downtown. Extremely cozy. Gary was super helpful and provided us with some great information for alternative activities when it started raining. Our stay was great!

This is a great place in an even better location. The room is private with all the accommodations you could ask for. Gary was very responsive and helpful. The house is only a couple blocks from downtown Traverse City which makes the location perfect. We will definitely be staying there again!

What a great little spot in the heart of TC! Close to everything...Gary was an excellent host and offered his knowledge of the surrounding areas while respecting our privacy during the stay. We'll definitely return!! BB - Michigan
Location was perfect. Private, cozy, spacious, hip. Gary was so friendly and helpful.

You cannot ask for a better place in Traverse City. A short walk into downtown but nestled in a quiet neighborhood for a relaxing night evening under the stars. The home owners were very welcoming and accommodating. The place itself is everything you could ask for; all the necessary amenities and more. When I return to Traverse City, this will always be the first place I look!

The house is in a quiet neighborhood and close to the beach, restaurants and shops. Everything is walkable which made this perfect for us. Gary & Lisa are accommodating hosts. They are respectful of your space but available to help/chat/offer suggestions. It is a perfect oasis after a long day of adventures.
Nice place within walking distance to downtown. Great communication from owner.

Great hosts. We got in very late and t
They were very accommodating. I look forward to going back.
Awesome location, great host, and a perfect studio apartment for one or two people. I will be going back... maybe even next month again.

This apartment is so charming, and it's ideally located very central to all that Traverse City has to offer. It's also very quiet and peaceful, much appreciated after busy days. We found the accommodation well appointed, with a comfortable bed and good shower, and everything we needed for a week of vacation. Hosts, Gary and Lisa, are gracious and attentive, and we will certainly try to stay with them again when we are back in town.
Highly recommended!
Good price, good location.

Cute cottage on Lake Bryan. Perfect for the four of us to relax and enjoy the early summer weather! We enjoyed the fishing from the dock and walk to town each night to take in some live music and fun!

Such a beautifully decorated space and serene view/water frontage! Very close and convenient drive to Lake Ann restaurants/store/playground. Troy was very accommodating and easy to get ahold of! Would definitely stay here again. Thank you!
An elegant stay with a superb host - thank you !

This was one of the nicest AB&Bs we have ever stayed at. Everything was beautiful. Super clean. Joshua was great with communication. Check in very simple. Location is beautiful with so much to do. Shops, restaurants all top notch. So peaceful and relaxing. Will definitely do it again! Thank you so much!
Very nice place! Super cool about the history of the place. We did have some trouble getting in but we showed up pretty late that night.
Unique place to stay. Would stay again!
Repeat visit.. beautiful clean loft to stay within walking distance to great great restaurants in the Commons area.
Very nice condo! Spacious with everything you need. We walked to almost everything we wanted to do/see
We had a great stay. Josh was flexible and very responsive. The Airbnb location was great and so easy to find. Very close to all the places we wanted to visit.

Had a fabulous stay and highly recommend. We stay at the Commons a couple times a year and every place is unique. This condo is spacious and quiet. Comfortable beds, linens and shower has great pressure. Kitchen has everything you would need including a tea kettle and French press. The extra touches Josh puts in his place are so appreciated. Thank you. We can’t wait to come back.
The condo was very clean and comfortable in a unique setting. Had a bit of trouble figuring out the elevator but only because we didn't read Josh's instructions clearly. Highly recommend.
Great stay at Josh’s place loved everything about it
Super convenient. Thank you.

We loved staying in Joshua's suite! It was immaculate with a peaceful minimalist vibe. The kitchen was complete with everything we needed for our stay including coffee, olive oil, balsamic vinegar and paper towels.
The photo's of the suite were accurate- depicting the bright cheery place it was.
There was plenty of free parking behind the building, with a coffee shop, bakery and several restaurants on site. I had fun hiking in the woods behind the building on marked trails.
If we find ourselves in the area again, we would definitely want to stay at Joshua's suite!
I've always wanted to stay at this location. Josh and Chad's place was a great spot. The murphy bed was very comfortable and so were the pillows. Just wish we had had more time to explore.
The place was absolutely amazing! Also great restaurants and shopping on site! We will definitely be staying here again!!

Our stay was absolutely wonderful. The location was perfect and we loved the rich history of our surroundings. Our space was clean, airy and felt like a 5-star hotel. It is truly one of the best stocked Air B&B's we've stayed at. It made meal preparation easy. We met several neighbors and locals during our stay and they were lovely as well. Treat yourself to a stay here, you won't regret it!

I really had a great stay here, and the host was fantastic. This is the best Airbnb I have stayed in by far. The amenities were high quality, great tea and coffee, they even had stevia packets for us in the cupboard. All the little things included along with the location and historic building really made this stand out. I would love to stay here again.
Really enjoyed our stay, the place was super nice and in such a cool area
Super relaxing and adventurous time away 😃
Great place with such character and history. Highly recommend
We really enjoyed Joshua’s place. Would recommend if you are in the area!
We had a wonderful stay and will definitely be back!

We weren't looking for exciting. Even though we were celebrating both of our birthdays, we just needed a nap, a decent meal and some peace and quiet. Check, check and check. PepeNero is on site and has an interesting menu. The residence is comfortable and so incredibly quiet. Our only regret was that we didn't have an extra day or two. Thanks Joshua & Chad.
Exactly as advertised. We were more than satisfied. Very clean and spacious and having all of the shops and restaurants in the same building worked out great for us. We highly recommend.
This was our second stay, and hope to be back again.
Beautiful and clean space. Nice shopping and restaurants right on the property/in the building but residential floors are private and quiet. Highly recommend!
Super unique space, every amenity we needed, squeaky clean and comfortable! The history of the building and quality of the renovations were apparent throughout our stay.
Joshua and Chad do a wonderful job! We loved the location and couldn’t have asked for a better stay. HIGHLY recommend!

We absolutely loved our stay here! The photos do not do it justice, the unit is very spacious yet also feels cozy and relaxing. So much to do in the commons, and not too far from downtown TC. Highly recommend!
Excellent location! This was a lovely place to stay. I would highly recommend!

This stay was our first trip since having our baby 2 months ago. My husband and I were looking for a little getaway for NYE. Joshua and Chad’s place is in a great location and has so much character. We loved being walking distance to shops and restaurants and even nice walking paths around the grounds. The drive downtown and the peninsulas are close too so we enjoyed going to some breweries and vineyards. Everything about their space was clean and comfy. It was the perfect spot for us. I’m very happy with our stay and highly recommend booking here!
Absolutely beautiful! Perfect location!

I will echo what all the other reviews say....book this when in Traverse City! Our 2 nights during blustery December weather were cozy and quiet. And what's not to like about heading downstairs for coffee, food, and shopping? No need to bundle up and brave the elements. Everything you want is right there.

This is our second time staying in one of Joshua and Chad’s listings and both stays have been great. Check-in communication is proactive and very detailed, which makes getting in a snap. The space is clean, bright, beautiful and nicely furnished. You can see their attention to detail in items like linens, bath products and kitchen tools. This particular unit is absolutely beautiful, with its high ceilings and windows. We will definitely stay here again.
Great location, make sure to check the instructions on the app. Getting into the elevator (entering the code) was not obvious without the instructions..
This was a great place, beautiful condo in a cool area, and the hosts were friendly and communicative. I would definitely stay again!
Very unique and special condo that really felt like home. The location is fantastic.
This was was our favorite place we have stayed in Traverse City. Beautiful home with everything you need. Lots to do within walking distance.

Very neat place. The condo, itself, had amazingly high vaulted ceilings that just made the place feel so open. Everything was very cozy and I thought the various reading materials were a nice touch. There's plenty to do with shops and eateries on the garden level, but visiting the downtown area is very worth it too. Highly recommended.

Beautiful location, hands down best place to stay in Traverse City. We enjoyed the evening tour of the grounds, and had some of the best meals just downstairs at Stella’s and Red Spire. Joshua was a great host!

My wife was in love with the entire building and the apartment.
And you couldn't beat the area , lots to do and the leaves were perfect!
We had a great stay at Joshua’s place. It was very clean, nicely decorated, very cool architecture and a great location. Check in was very simple and Joshua responded quickly to all communications.
Fantastic stay. Beautiful suite in an even more beautiful building and surrounding grounds. Everything was better than expected and we would absolutely stay again. Thanks for everything, Joshua!

It just does not get better than this! A beautiful condo tastefully decorated, thoughtfully appointed and located in a historic building on the Commons grounds that are fascinating to explore. Our next destination was the Grand Hotel on Mackinac Island and yet, all we seem to talk about when sharing news of our autumn getaway is our experience at this unique and special Airbnb. Simply divine.

Location was excellent for exploring Traverse City. Rained the day of our arrival, which allowed us to explore the shops and restaurants in the building.
Will definitely recommend to friends and family.
Also planning to stay next time we are in Traverse City.
Very nice, look exactly as pictured. Great location!

Beautiful place to stay! The step by step directions to get into the apartment were so helpful! Very peaceful and relaxing! Both beds were super comfortable. Would definitely recommend staying here to anyone!

This was our first time using AirBnB. We were in town visiting a friend who coincidentally works in the same building. The building is awesome as is the AirBnB. The AirBnB is gorgeous and very clean. It has everything you could need, plates, glasses, wine opener, an Apple TV with multiple streaming services. The bed was incredibly comfy, we fell asleep immediately. The location is fantastic too, there’s restaurants for both breakfast and dinner as well as other stores in the same building. We’ll definitely be back!
Location is 10/10! We had such a great weekend!

This was a getaway to remember for my girlfriend and I! The host and location were superb. Everything we needed and more. The peaceful location was full of history. We felt like we were set apart from the city in our own like oasis. Yet, we were close enough to enjoy the nature of the area and the shops of the property and city.
Josh and Chad are great hosts. We'll be back!
A wonderful space to stay! Couldn’t have enjoyed our time more. Thanks!
Beautiful location, clean, perfect stay for a girls weekend
Great place! Great location! Highly recommend the asylum tour.
Great place! Clean, location was amazing and Joshua was very responsive! Definitely would stay again.

This was our first stay at the Commons and we loved it. Came in to town for a race that took place on the grounds. It was so convenient to just walk back up to the space after the run, and to head downstairs for coffee and breakfast in the morning. The condo is very comfortable and welcoming.
What a great place!

Joshua and Chad have a wonderful place to stay in Traverse City. The location is amazing and the condo is beautiful. It’s so fun to stay in the old hospital and there are so many things to do within walking distance. Very relaxing and enjoyable.

We really enjoyed our stay. The location provided a unique experience with many onsite amenities. Joshua gave clear instructions on getting into the property that were very helpful and communicated well during our arrival. We would definitely recommend or keep in mind if we visit town again.
It's a GORGEOUS space !!!!!! Free parking. Yummy dining. I wish we could have stayed longer.
Beautiful place with great amenities and Joshua was super responsive when we had a question. The beds were very comfortable and the grounds were lovely. Super cool place with interesting history.

Joshua is a wonderful host! The condo has space and light and rain sounds lovely on the roof. There is space to curl up and read, as well as enough room to be in separate spaces. The high ceilings and architecture make this home uniquely beautiful. The linens and bed are heavenly!! We enjoyed a fabulous dinner at Trattoria Stella before a concert at Interlochen, and had brunch downstairs in the morning. Joshua has photo books about the historic buildings and a folio of suggestions of things to do in the area. I love that the trees on the grounds are mapped out. This home is lovingly cared for, with great attention to details!
Really fantastic spot , high ceilings and open concept really makes the place feel spacious and comfortable
What a cool spot! The perfect base to explore the area and come back to with restaurants and services at night. Bright, airy, comfortable beds and well stocked kitchen. We enjoyed it very much.

Great stay. The condo was beautiful and the super high ceilings made it seem so roomy. The bottom floor is full of shops and restaurants, and it was fun to bop around the shops and then just pop in the elevator to get back “home.” Great place in a historic building!
Was easy to find, cozy and clean! Perfect spot to crash in tc for the night!
The condo was in a great complex with lots of history and charm - and walkable to great shops and restaurants! It was a fun place and great stay.

Wonderful stay! Clean, comfortable, spacious and had all the things needed to prepare a meal when staying in. Clear, easy instructions for checking in. The Village has wonderful shops and restaurants worth visiting. Stop at Earthen Ales for a beer, Red Spire for brunch, and Pepé Nero's for an incredible Italian dinner. Highly recommend doing one of the walking asylum tours-fascinating! Reservations for Nero's and the tour are recommended. The condo faces East and is bright and cheery first thing in the morning (important info for the non-cheery morning folks). Walkable to downtown TC. Can't wait to visit again!
Thank you for a nice place to stay.
This is a great place to stay, with lots of restaurants in walking distance. Clean and well appointed!

Joshua was the most amazing host. Not only is his place amazing but he was more than willing to help me when I left my toiletry bag behind.
I plan to book his plan anytime I come back to the area. I just can’t say enough great things.

This was my first time renting an Airbnb and my expectations were exceeded beyond belief. The condo was unique, beautiful, immaculate, and extremely comfortable. Decor was creatively and beautifully appointed. My daughter and I only stayed 2 nights, but wished we had planned a week there. Condo was conveniently near to all downtown sites and areas, but still provided a quick 3 minute respite from all the bustle of a busy day. Also, the breakfast at the restaurant 3 floors below was spectacular! I am extremely finicky and my daughter was happily surprised that I had nothing but positivity about this stay! Loved, loved, loved it here!

This place was just wonderful. After deciding last minute we needed to stay in the area another night to explore more, we were able to book with ease and quickly. On site parking and a great location. The space itself is just gorgeous with the high ceilings and spacious rooms. We would most definitely stay again and wish we stayed longer this time.

This was our very first time ever trying an AirBnB, but we may just have become overnight converts! This condo was amazing! The price was very reasonable (especially considering what local hotels are charging). As rookie AirBnB'ers, Joshua's instructions were super clear. Driving instructions directed to the parking and front door of this large estate. My kids loved entering the secret code for elevator service as well as sleeping on a (very comfortable) Murphy Bed for the first time. Because of dietary needs, it was great having a full kitchen! The complex is absolutely gorgeous. The building has such rich history and we found it fun to learn all about it. The local boutique's and restaurants on the campus make this a special treasure as well. The location off the lake keeps you out of the heaviest traffic and lets you park for free which we thought was a great bonus. With a 30 minute drive you can go to other areas like Sleeping Bear Dunes, Empire, Glen Arbor, Sutton's Bay, & Leland.

Our stay at Joshua and Chad’s was perfect. A last minute reservation ended up being one of the best Airbnb stays we’ve ever had. The condo was perfect. Spotless. Comfortable. Close to everything. We would have stayed here longer if we weren’t already committed somewhere else! We loved everything about this property and condo and will stay here again!

We had a wonderful, brief stay at Joshua’s place! The apartment is roomy, pristine, and in a great location. Our host left clear and helpful instructions, which we appreciated. Both beds were comfy, and the Murphy bed was easy to use. It’s an easy walk to restaurants and the coffee shops in adjoining buildings. Would definitely stay again if they’ll have us!
Joshua was very friendly! Gave us a great description on how to enter the building. The space was very spacious and clean. Will be staying again!
Staying at the commons is always a unique experience. The history of the buildings alone is worth a visit. It's been a busy week in Traverse City - highly recommend.
My family and I loved our stay at Joshua’s! Great historical location! 0 complaints this way
Lovely condo, great location, responsive host.

Great stay! The Villages at Grand Traverse was such a unique stay. Great restaurants and shops and we even got to take a guided tour of the property and learn about the history of the hospital. We had a great stay and love Traverse City!!

Nice place, Joshua was very responsive. Very specific directions to get in building, and you need them! Quiet spot. Lights in hallway go off at 1030 and it's DARK. Just a heads up. Could not get door to lock, but really never saw a person on our floor so we were not concerned. Then it locked when we left, so all good. Joshua also allowed us early access because we needed to get ready for our event. Would definitely recommend.
Wonderful place, kind hosts, comfy beds!
Great place and cool grounds.

Very good place to stay in TC! Everything we could need is provided here.
2. Concerns -
a) the window shades are a see thru type that lets in a lot of light. We were there June 19-22, sun up 5:30 and down after 10pm. Very bright during these times.
b) we were contacted the first night regarding the people in the condo below ours that we were making excessive noise and jumping around? Nothing could be more false, unless the place is usually vacant and there are no sounds???
Someone ia

We enjoyed our stay at the historic building! The location is convenient, has shops downstairs, restaurants and hiking trails within walking distance and isn't far from downtown. Will definitely stay here again!
Super kind and quick to respond. Very beautiful, historical building.

My friends and I stayed at this condo for a girls trip, we really enjoyed our stay. Josh & Chad were helpful and responsive when we had any questions. The condo is beautiful & we loved the historical feel. The location was perfect for us, not too far from the wineries or downtown. We would absolutely stay again.

My husband and I loved it here! I have always wanted to stay in this building! Awesome history. Josh made check in and check out super easy. This is a great location right near a ton of restaurants and shops and not a far drive to wineries! Place was spotless. Definitely want to stay again in the future!
Quiet and comfortable stay in a historic building.

Chose a repeat visit because the first met and exceeded expectations.
The property is clean, comfortable and full of character. Would recommend as it meets all criteria for a highly functional studio in an awesome location.
Joshua’s home was clean, convenient and easy to check in. Great restaurants around the home and walkable.
Great location in a very historic area! Even if the place wasn’t perfect, the history is enough. I’m in traverse every 6 to 8 weeks, this is my new go to! Thanks for the hospitality!
Absolutely loved staying here! Such a beautiful home with so much history! Josh’s was extremely helpful and kind upon checkin and checkout. Can’t wait to stay here again!

We had a wonderful time with our friends in this beautiful, sparkling clean, apartment. it is such an interesting place with so much to do at the village without leaving the grounds! we had a very relaxing enjoyable time!
Had a great weekend getaway with the wife, apartment was clean and very nice.
Great location, the condo was spotless perfect for our needs! Would stay here again in a heartbeat

The condo was just as expected and more...thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would love to stay here again. Everything went smoothly and was the perfect winter getaway.
Thank you
Very unique place to stay loved the historic vibe.
location is great, quiet.

Beautiful, and unique place to stay. Clean and cute, and I loved the stores downstairs. Close to downtown and not far from most wineries either. We came when there was still snow, and we will definitely be back, when we have some better weather!
Thank you so much for being a great host Josh!

This was the perfect spot for an overnight in traverse city. It was so much fun staying in the old state hospital. The apartment was clean and up to date! Amazing location - would definitely stay again!
Great stay and super clean and easy to get to. It was very quiet and cozy.
you'd have to be INSANE to pass up this CRAZY cool pad.
We had a wonderful time. Highly recommend staying here!
Lovely large, light apartment in gorgeous setting. Big, well-stocked kitchen, comfortable bed & linens. Very nice bathroom with large shower. Many extra touches.

This is a sparkling clean, adorably stylish and comfortable one-bedroom unit in the heart of Traverse City's bustling industrial area. Everything is new and fresh and comfortable. Highly recommend!
Great space in a perfect location with everything you could need. Very clean!

Dave is a great host. We arrived to a bottle of wine in the fridge, list of local recommendations, and simple instructions of the place (which seemed brand new). The location is perfect!! It's also a close walk to many great restaurants!

We had a great stay! The condo is super clean and the location is excellent. Comfortable bed and great amenities. We appreciated the parking pass for the garage next door that has free charging for electric vehicles.

Absolutely terrific rental and experience. Dave has a spotless space (so reassuring in these COVID times) that is elegantly designed without fuss. Thoughtful touches, well stocked, and a perfect location. A definite 5 star!

Dave's place is excellent - clean, new, modern, in a great location with a well equipped kitchen. Plus, he has added several nice touches like phone charging cables for all types of phones on each nightstand, Keurig coffee setup and local restaurant recommendations. Highly recommend.
I really enjoyed this place. Very clean and bright with high end finishes. The bed was amazingly comfortable. Great location. I would definitely stay there again!

Great location. Super clean. Three flights of stairs is good for you! Key less entry a huge win. Parking lot is super tight and can be annoying. Parking garage is convenient when you don't fit in the lot (which puts an end to annoying). Comfortable bed, pillows and sheets. Quiet in regards to street noise and neighbors. Dave is quick to respond to questions and insightful. Great place.

Staying at Dave’s place was just amazing! We decided to stay an extra night for our mini moon and I found Dave’s place so we decided to book it and let me tell you, this was the best decision we made all of our trip. It was so incredibly clean and comfortable! I would highly recommend Dave’s place to anyone and will definitely be staying again in the future!

Dave's place is phenomenal. Spectacularly clean and well decorated. The location is extremely close to everything so walking is a breeze. Would def. recommend Dave's place for anyone looking to visit TC.

The reviews you read are all true! The place is meticulous cared for and clean. Dave has thought of everything to make your stay like you are at home and it couldn’t be any more convenient to restaurants and bars. Would definitely stay again!
Great location, clean, and had everything we expected and more!

This condo is wonderful! We walked to dinner each night since everything is a 10 or 15 minute walk away. So nice being right in town and on the edge of a beautiful neighborhood to stroll through.
There were lots of extras in the condo, we stay in 6-8 places a year and have never seen a condo so well stocked. Coffee and a bottle of wine are waiting for you, plus a generous supply of clean towels, laundry soap and best of all...aluminum foil and plastic wrap to use for food/leftover storage😊
Plus the place is spotless and very comfortably furnished, we will be back!

The location of this place is amazing! You can walk to restaurants, shops, the beach, and so many more places! The apartment is very cute and comfortable! Was a great place for me and my fiance to stay for a restful vacation!
Perfectly equipped space, very comfortable. Excellent location. We enjoyed our time thoroughly. Cant wait to return!
Walking distance to so many things downtown traverse city. Place is beautiful, clean, charming. Would highly recommend staying when staying in traverse city!
Great place second stay at Daves. Will be back next year.

My stay here was terrific! I have never checked in to a cleaner space. The condo is located in a quiet and peaceful community yet is just a short walk away from Traverse City’s charming downtown area. Dave is also very responsive and is clearly committed to being a terrific host. 10/10 would recommend!

The rental looked even better than the pictures showed. The most important thing to me when staying in a VRBO is that it is very clean. This one was exceptionally clean. Bathrooms and kitchen were spotless. Beds were very comfortable. The only thing that could have been cleaner was the patio. Lots of spider webs. We just used the furniture on the beach instead. But I do feel like that’s harder to keep up with and it wouldn’t keep me from staying again. We really enjoyed walking right out to beach. Overall, great stay!
Place was great, exactly like the pictures, just as expected, gorgeous and an excellent vacation spot.

This was the 2nd year we stayed here. Everything was as clean and cozy as last year. There is some road construction that made for some traffic at rush hour, but that is supposed to be finished in November. The view from the condo is great, right by the water. It's a great place to relax. A couple of day trips took us to see lighthouses and sand dunes. The condo is very clean and well decorated. Three bedrooms and 3 bathrooms were perfect. I definitely recommend it.

The place was exactly what we needed for our stay!
Larger even than it looks in the photos, which was a nice bonus. The building is quiet with a lovely view. Would absolutely stay here again.
Beautiful place, always try and book when we come to the area for work.

If you're looking for a place in Traverse City to make forever memories with loved ones, this is it! Definately not the cheapest Airbnb in Traverse City, but worth every penny. This place is absolutely worth splurging on. Right on Sugar Beach with breath-taking views. You cannot go wrong with this rental.
The view is indescribable - gorgeous! Very nice space with all the amenities you could need. Everything you could want to do is right nearby.

The condo was beautiful and spacious, upscale with everything we needed to relax and to entertain. We loved being just steps from the water. The view was gorgeous! Katy is very responsive and a great communicator. We would definitely stay there again. :)
We have stayed at the condo 2 times now and are already booking for next year, Katy is a great host and love the accommodations!

This was a beautiful condo, with the beach literally right outside the back door. The space was amazing and had everything our group needed to feel at home for a long weekend - fully-equipped kitchen, comfortable bedrooms, plenty of towels and blankets, and lots of amazing "extras" that show a lot of thought and care has been put into this home. Katy was also an excellent host - very communicative with extremely quick responses. We're definitely planning to book again!

A very comfortable space with great amenities and proximity to Traverse City. This was a wonderful landing spot while attending a conference nearby! If anything we wish had had more downtime to enjoy Katy's rental.

Just finished a long weekend at the villa and absolutely had a great time. Katy was an outstanding host! Very responsive and accommodating. The Sugar Beach Villa was very comfortable for our group of 6 (3 couples). Clean, lots of amenities, comfortable beds, and beautiful views of the bay. Would definitely stay here again!

Katy was very responsive and helpful. The condo unit was beautiful and super clean. It literally is on top of the private beach on East Bay.
Oh ya, the heated floors in the bathrooms and kitchen are great on a chilly morning.
We can’t wait to return with more family members. It is perfect for our young family.
Pictures do not do this place justice! Very pretty and welcoming! Beautiful private beach! Marisa was sweet and caring!

They were incredibly accommodating with our stay. Great communication when we mistook Sugar Beach resorts with sugar beach villas (I suggest you don’t make the same mistake or you may face the sarcastic wrath of your partner). Quick response rate. Beautiful private beach and lovely home.

Steps out the back door is a nice sandy beach and beautiful lake. Jet ski and boat rentals are next door and so are bike rentals (we did it all). The condo is very nice, clean and comfortable. The beds were comfy, the darkening shades were a bonus. Big bathrooms with plenty of plush towels. The open concept kitchen and living area are great for family time. The condo living was great for our family of 4, we felt very comfortable. The location to Downtown TC is a bit farther out then I was expecting (had hoped to bike and walk more into town, it’s way too far for a walk, the bike was a good 30+ min, be sure to use the awesome bike trail behind Einsteins bike rental, the kids and I enjoyed the 6+ mile bike ride there and back as long as you use the trail). The farm club was a new restaurant experience worth a visit, and the wineries on old mission are easy to access from the home so that’s a plus too. The jet skis were a big highlight. A+ rental. Katy is a great host very responsive.
The condo is a perfect place for a family reunion, especially one with small children or grandchildren. The beach is beautiful and the water is shallow enough for young children.
Excellent! Thanks!!

Katy is an excellent host. Definitely a 5 star. There were a couple of issues during our stay. She responded quickly and everything was taken care of in a timely manner. The condo was beautiful and in a lovely area. Would definitely look for a rental from Katy again.
Katy’s place was unbelievable. The inside exceeded my expectations and more. The instructions were perfect and we all felt right at home. Highly highly recommend.

Everything was beautiful! The kitchen was fully stocked!! Very impressive, the heated floors were amazing and felt great! Lots of room, decor was so beautiful and felt at home, beds were comfortable and the views spectacular!! We only wish it was warmer to sit on the deck. Thank you, Katy for everything, you're a great Host! Definitely would book again!
The only thing that was a little complicated to understand was how to turn on the tv. Other than that it was a beautiful place, & we really enjoyed our stay.
Lovely stay, beautiful setting, hospitable hostess. Thank you!

Where do I start! The villa was exactly like in the photos; spacious and well-furnished. View was amazing. The villa is MORE than well-equipped with everything a family would need - from cooking, baking, entertaining (wine chiller too!), board games and cable TV. There were plenty of towels, beach towels, pillow, throws, etc. Katy was a great host, incredibly responsive at all hours of the day & night. I can only imagine that this villa would be fully-booked at peak season and deservedly so. Definitely a 5-star recommendation based on location, accessibility, amenities, comfort, cleanliness AND responsiveness of host.

We loved our first time stay here in this beautiful waterfront condo! The view was unmatched and there were plenty of local things to do. We enjoyed the sunset and sunrise everyday and all of the amenities that were included. This Airbnb had everything you could think of in the home from the kitchen appliances to the plate ware and cookware! Not to mention the heated floors (which was a pleasantly unexpected amenity) Katy was the perfect host and was very responsive and super informative, which we appreciated! Only negative was that the deck was not assembled and beach chairs were not present as pictured when we stayed and blocked what would’ve been a full 360 view. I’m guessing it’s because we went while it was still relatively cold. (Beginning of April) Nonetheless we worked around it and had an amazing time! We will definitely be returning as soon as we can!

Katys place was a wonderful home away from home. We had access to a private beach and the airbnb was perfect for our family getaway. Everything provided here was well thought out and intentional from the decorations, to how cozy the bedrooms were, to the fully stocked kitchen and game closet. We just happened to be here at the right time and got to experience the beautiful Northern Lights displayed over the East Bay. We highly recommend this property or any property that Katy maintains as we are sure all her properties are held to the same standard. We hope to be back soon!

We are two couples that have been doing a winter weekend getaway for well over a dozen years. We have stayed a lot of places over the years. This was the perfect Cinderella fit for us. A nice spacious common space, and well spaced sleeping quarters each with their own bathroom.

We spent the majority of a week at the condo and had an amazing time discovering new places to eat and drink. Even though it was winter, the view is amazing. Comfortable furnitures and beds, heated tile in the bathrooms and kitchen was a nice luxury with the cold temps outside. We would absolutely stay there again.
This is a gorgeous home with every amenity you could think of. Katy has done all the work to ensure that you can settle in and enjoy your stay.
Beautiful condo with a stunning view of the bay!

The condo was absolutely beautiful!! Very spacious, comfortable, very clean, awesome amenities and lots of extras (games, puzzles, books, dvd’s)! Beautiful decorations throughout the condo (even some Christmas decorations)! Katy was very responsive and personable!! We would love to return in the near future!! ❤️
Absolutely beautiful home and views.
An incredible place, Katy is an awesome host! Have stayed in many rentals, this is one of the best! Looking forward to our next stay as well as looking at some of Katie’s other properties.

Katy is amazing! It was beautiful and peaceful and communication with host was quick responses, super nice and helpful! Would love to stay here again but for a longer period of time, we didn't want to leave!

Katy was such an amazing host! We had to change our weekends last minute due to a family death and she was SO accommodating. Katy was so flexible and kind. The Airbnb itself was absolutely beautiful. We plan to stay there again in the summer! Thank you Katy for everything!

This place was AMAZING!!! BETTER THAN THE PICTURES!!! We came and stayed here for my fiance's 30 th birthday and had an amazing time being on the water in this wonderful place. Plenty of towels, kitchen items, games, shampoo, conditioner, soap, and more! It was very peaceful, and the location was really convenient! I would recommend this place. 👍
Katy was an excellent host. She checked on us every day to see if we needed anything. The condo was beautiful and comfortable. We had a very enjoyable and relaxing weekend thanks to Katy!
Wonderful waking up to a gorgeous private beach front view and tucking our toes in the sand, while sipping coffee. Very relaxing 😊

The location is amazing - literally walk out of the back door onto a private stretch of beautiful beach. Amazingly well stocked kitchen. Clean, well maintained condo. We will definitely be coming back!

We ♥️♥️♥️’d this property! The location was perfect! Beach is gorgeous. Walking distance to putt putt and several restaurants. Jet ski and pontoon rentals at next door hotel. Overall very cozy with gorgeous views. We would highly recommend! And hope to return!
Great stay and location! Condo had everything we needed and very spacious!
Beautiful condo ! Very clean ! Katy was very responsive to any and all questions ! Location was great!

Beautiful stay!! The beds were absolutely amazing, almost didn’t want to get out of bed because of how comfortable they were. Very quiet relaxing weekend with not many people around. Had a little trouble checking in but everything was truly amazing!

Beautiful space inside and out. Only down side is that the residents within are not happy about having Airbnb within their building and are watching constant so they can report anything they see/think you should not be doing. Not a friendly and welcoming bunch…

Perfect cozy cabin for a weekend getaway for 2 people! The view of the lake is gorgeous from the deck or firepit at all times of the day. Communication with the host was quick, considerate and professional when needed. Only about a 25 min drive to the Sleeping Bear Dunes, wineries/wine tastings and 10 minutes to downtown Traverse City.
Great place for a long trip or a quick weekend away. Everything is exactly as described. Would definitely come back!

This is a cozy little cabin- with a great view of the lake - Riley is an excellent responsive host. The cabin is well equipped and comfortable. It is convenient to Traverse City - yet gives you the feeling of being on vacation-a great place to relax.
The stay was great. Trail side condos are a perfect location
Great location and very clean.

Great Location!!
Great Apartment!!

Perfect stay if you need a quiet place for you and your dog. The couch could use replacing, but the rest of the apartment met all of our expectations. People in the building were very quiet and friendly.
Condo was great! Nice and clean, no issues throughout the stay.
Riley was super timely when it came to communicating with us. The place was very clean, bed was comfy and the little porch was cute! Thanks for a great anniversary stay!
Loved having a nice place to stay where I could bring my dog, and still be close to downtown.

This was a great place to stay during our visit to Traverse City. It’s very close to the downtown area and near a lot of beaches. The kitchen was a great amenity to have when we wanted to cook a couple meals instead of going out. There was plenty of utensils, plates, pots, and pans to use. Riley was quick to respond to any questions I had and gave clear instructions when checking in. I will be staying here again!

Riley’s apartment was a perfect home base for our Traverse City adventures. It was just as advertised, clean and ready for our arrival. Adjacent to the TART Trail. Although not quite walking distance, it was a very short drive to downtown shopping and restaurants and, importantly, it was centrally located for exploration in every direction … Sleeping Bear Dunes to the west, the Leelenau Peninsula to the northwest, and Old Mission Peninsula to the northeast. Met all of our needs and expectations!

Nice clean place with great amenities. Wish the pull out sofa was a bit more comfortable. Street noise was a bit loud but the location is great. Right on the TART bike trail was the highlight! We were able to get everywhere by bike.
This was a great place to stay very close to downtown and affordable compared to other places we looked at staying!
Perfect location. Loved being able to walk to coffee shops, restaurants, and breweries and was close distance to the lake! Had all the amenities we needed to make it home for a week.
Clean one bedroom apartment.
Beautiful home
A great place to stay, easy to find, easy to get into, and very close to downtown Traverse City!
I will try to always stay at trailside when I come to T.C, love that I can walk my dog on the TART trail and the condo is always clean
TART trail close so I could walk my dog, always clean

Overall very pleased with our stay. Plenty of parking by the building and it was easy to check in. Location makes it very easy to get into downtown TC. Building is located on a major road and the noise from traffic was significant.
Very nice location next to the the TART trail, clean space and worked really well for two humans and two dogs. Thanks again!
Beautiful, well-appointed apartment within walking distance of all the sites, food, and shopping in Traverse City. Great communication, quick responses.

The apartment has everything we need for a week long stay. I really liked the location - there are a few food/coffee places and grocery stores that’s ~5-10 mins walk away. The TART path is right by the apartment complex and it took us about ~20-30 mins to walk to Front street. Overall, would recommend this Airbnb for anyone looking to spend some time in Traverse City!
definitely would stay here again . great location
Nice place, great location and loved that it was pet friendly.

Super cute stay! I had some check in issues that were immediately resolved and accommodated for! Amazing fast response! The rooms were cute and clean! Great spot by the trails for walking my dog. Will definitely book again!
This was a great place with a perfect location. Clean and very comfortable. Would definitely stay again.
it was a great stay!
Lovely clean condo! We really loved our stay in Traverse City!
Great place to stay! Super clean and had everything we needed.
Great apartment and as-advertised. Easy and painless check-in and check-out.

This Airbnb was great! Location was very convenient for Traverse City. Lots of things to do within walking distance. Host’s communication was also very punctual and professional. This Airbnb was perfectly stocked with all essentials. I would definitely stay here again.
Beautiful, modern condo in a great location! We especially liked that it was directly on the TART bike path. We would book it again.

Such a great experience staying at Riley’s place. The apartment is absolutely beautiful and super clean, I really enjoyed my stay there and will definitely try and stay there again next time I’m in Traverse City
Highly recommend- great space and excellent communication from the host!

This was a fabulous place to stay for our getaway to Traverse City. It’s super close to town, the layout is just darling and it was spotlessly clean. Our dog stayed with us during the trip as well and he enjoyed it, too. The host was superb on communication. Would definitely stay here again!

Very amazing stay! Everything was so clean and had extra’s of everything. Blankets, towels, washer, drier. Very convenient, it was close to downtown too! I will stay here again. Amazing place! I would highly recommend.
Great place and location👍
Riley's apartment is in very clean and in a great location, close to everything we needed. Riley was communicative, which made for an easy stay.

We absolutely loved the apartment! We loved the furniture and the bed was comfy. The location was centrally located for exploring the area. Spacious and clean and extra touches to make you comfortable!
beautiful property and Riley was quick to respond

Layla's house was clean and appeared to be a new construction. Location was good, not too far from sleeping bear or downtown traverse city. Be aware (we didnt read carefully enough) that one bed is an airbed. Ours had a leak but Layla replaced it immediately.
Great house and Layla was very friendly and helpful!

T.C. rooftop rentals was amazing during my stay here. While there was an issue with the AC unit, they were very quick to accommodate me. When I was set to check out, another unit was offered to me an additional night to offset the warm nights I had in the prior unit. I would definitely recommend this company, the communication and friendliness alone will bring me back. Additionally, the second unit they put me up in is 10/10. Beautiful, cool and very clean. Thank you!
Rooftop rentals condo was really nice. We enjoyed one of the hot tubs on the roof. The Tv in the bedroom was a nice touch. Liked the decor. Would stay there again.
Amazing place. My girlfriend loved it, I loved it and we had a great time cooking in the amazing kitchen this apartment has!
Great value and beautiful space! Thank you!

Was in town for the Bayshore Marathon. This property was perfect! The tub was excellent for an ice bath and the rooftop hot tubs loosened all my aches and pains. The space is so beautiful and clean! Loved the location and it was very quiet! Would highly recommend

It was a pleasure staying in this condo! We found the place exactly as pictured, very clean and comfortable. The hot tubs on the roof were wonderful! There is construction going on but we never heard a thing; it was very quiet and peaceful. We appreciated their wonderful suggestions for trails etc. and visited a few during our stay. It was very thoughtful for the owners to include essentials like spices, aluminum foil and body wash for us to use during our stay. If you are looking for a place that puts you close to everything in TC, this is the place you will want to rent.

I had a fantastic stay! The hosts were very nice, understanding, and responsive. The place was clean and close to many beaches. The pictures posted on the app are exactly what the place looks like. I highly recommend taking a 30-minute drive to hike Pyramid Point it’s an unbelievable scenery that doesn’t feel like it should be in Michigan! Also, don’t miss soaking in the hot tubs on the rooftop.

I really enjoyed my stay. The place made me feel like I was at home! I love that it was in walking distance of downtown traverse city and the fact you could walk to the beach! It was over all a welcoming place!
Beautiful condo! An amazing, quiet place to stay with amazing hosts.

Very good experience. The host responses are super quick, super proactive, and helpful. The apartment is located super close to restaurants and parks. They even provide a guide with activities close by. The building is on construction, but I barely could hear anything, very peaceful. The pictures are accurate, it is open and modern, with lots of windows. They also have a full kitchen with lots of equipments.
Love this place! Easy check in and check out. Hosts are the nicest and so accommodating. Highly recommend, but also don’t want to because I want this place to be a secret!

Everything was great, booked at last minute and it was easy. Great location, very clean.
Great price and will stay again

Place was very well designed, and clean. They made it feel like home, and thought through every detail, such as a fan in the wardrobe, spices to cook with, and laundry detergent so we didn’t have to go home with dirty laundry. Plus the body wash smells amazing!

The place was perfect and really comfortable! It was really easy to get to all the places we wanted to. We really appreciated the accommodations and hospitality over the two nights we stayed. Already looking forward to coming back!

One of the best nights of sleep I’ve ever had! …and I know it must’ve been the bed since I had my fur baby with me. With that said, for a pet friendly spot that’s closer to some busy streets (one was noticeably busier because of construction), the unit was so quiet. I love the overall design of the place and all the interiors were well thought out. For a business trip, this was such a great find. Loved the rooftop hot tubs and the space was perfect for WFH. The hosts also put a lot of effort into sharing local
Gems (the welcome guide inside the apartment was a charming touch). I’d agree that the restaurants and coffee shops they recommend are fabulous and it was nice being a very short drive from some of the best! For those traveling with family (kids), it’s worth noting that the location doesn’t have park or water access. It is close, however, but there is a precarious intersection to cross to get to the bay and local parks. Regardless, I would stay again!
Very cute place to stay! Overall satisfied with our experience!

Great place in Traverse City. Unit was spotless, very clean, and very comfortable. In a great safe location but a quick Uber to downtown Traverse City. Would stay here again! Thanks for a great experience!

We had a wonderful time!!
Our dog was very happy and loved the windows. Place was very clean, extremely cute, and the furniture was very
comfortable. I felt right at home! Lots of windows for natural light. 10/10 would recommend
The owners were very gracious and allowed us to check in early. Great appreciated!
This was the perfect spot for the weekend! It was homey and clean!! The hosts were amazing and friendly. Definitely would stay here when visiting again!

We had a wonderful time!! Place was very clean, extremely cute, and the furniture was very comfortable. I felt right at home! Lots of windows for natural light and the kitchen came with anything you might need to cook on vacation. 10/10 would recommend :)

We had an amazing stay. The apartment was clean, cozy, and spacious. We really appreciated how dog friendly the condo and building was. The electric fireplace in the unit and the hot tubs on the roof are a nice touch!

Really good location!! Walkable distance from a lot of places to eat! Not too far from downtown. They had a booklet of things to do and places to go. I enjoyed the hot tubs a lot, very good way to unwind after a day of activities. Would definitely stay here again
Overall great stay

We had an absolutely great stay! The hosts were responsive and friendly, the location was easy to find, clean, and beautiful! Everything was well thought out and had all the amenities we could need for our stay! Definitely would stay here again 💕
Loved my stay I brang my baby and we had a wonderful stay
Perfect location for our weekend getaway in TC. Loved the open space design. Everything was very clean and thoughtfully decorated. Would recommend staying here!
Beautiful space and the host was very accommodating and available. Highly recommend!!!!

We had a great trip! TC Rooftop Rentals had everything we needed (spices to cook, extra blankets etc). They provided great recommendations and were in a convenient locations to be able to get where we wanted. Check in and out was simple and easy. We would definitely visit again!

Tc Rooftop Rentals was amazing for our long weekend girls trip. The place was exactly what we expected and everything was very clean. Many things to do nearby and well worth the price. If you are ever in Traverse City, I highly recommend!

This is a great opportunity for anyone looking to take part in All That Traverse City has to offer. Conveniently located to everything if you wanna walk or drive. The place is newer, very clean and the Hot Tub situation on the top floor is great amenity. I would recommend this place to family and friends and whoever is reading this. The Hosts were very responsive and friendly from the moment we booked until the very last day.
We will be back for sure!!
Very clean, very nice…….
Great place, close to downtown!

Hands down the best host/Airbnb I have stayed at so far. The pictures don’t do it justice! Arrived to a hand written note from our hostS with recommendations. Everything we could possibly need was available (beach towels, charger, spices for cooking, clear instructions etc.) The rooftop hot tubs was a major plus! Perfect for our girls weekend trip getaway. Communication was immaculate! Next time I’m visiting Traverse City definitely would stay here again!
Great place to stay and the host’s were attentive and most helpful… For sure will be spending more time with them!
Couldn’t be more pleased with this place! Everything as described and spotless upon arrival. Thanks to the owners for making our trip to Traverse City a great one!

I want to extend immense amount of gratitude to the hosts! They are all star! Our experience was one of the best we've had. The location had great amenities, a nice location and was an amazing experience overall. We really appreciated the quick response from the hosts! We'd 10/10 stay here again. Thanks again!

The listing matched our stay perfectly. We enjoyed the rooftop hot tubs, nearby restaurants and local hikes. The hosts were super responsive and provided lots of recommendations for us and our pup. We would stay there again!

This is a Lovely new and modern space - very clean and spacious with nice comfortable touches. The rooftop hot tub was great. This is a very nice place to get away or stay for business. Highly recommend and will return.

My stay was amazing and worthwhile. The place was clean and cutely decorated. I loved how descriptive and helpful the hosts were! There are excellent restaurants within walking distance! I would recommend to stay here.
Great property

My boyfriend and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the TC Rooftop condo. The place was spotless, and so cute. We loved how close it was to everything, and despite construction still going on, it was very quiet. The bed was so comfortable we are going to buy the same one for our home!
The hot tubs were a fun addition, and the bathtub in the bathroom was lovely. I bought some bath salts in town and used them in the tub for a relaxing night!
The owners provided clear and easy directions, and made sure we knew they were available if we needed anything. We were greeted in the condo with a book of their local favorite places to eat and things to do.
We will definitely be back and tell all our friends and family!
Had a wonderful stay here, was cozy and close to town so wasn’t much of a travel to get more downtown. Would definitely recommend staying here for a weekend getaway stay.

This condo was AMAZING and so close to amazing restaurants and activities! Cozy, clean, and comfy! An absolutely perfect space that felt like home. Furnished with everything I needed for my stay and will DEFINITELY stay here again when I’m back in Traverse City! And the hot tubs on the roof…. Seriously amazing! ☺️
Our stay was comfortable and close to everything we wanted to do. Hot tubes were really nice.

Everything here was great, I liked it better than most of the hotel rooms I’ve ever had in TC. Has everything we expected and the roof top hot tubs are excellent! High ceilings ,large windows, and modern kitchen was a perfect space for the two of us! We cooked a lot and had everything we needed. Thank you for letting us stay here!

The location was filthy - hair and particles all over the floor, shower curtain fell on the ground, the couch bed was filthy, the toilet and shower had hair and particulate in it. The toilet seat wasn’t connected correctly.
